name: Got Coffee?!
description:
!!!! Coffee Game jam version is in the gotcoffee_coffeejam.zip !!!

!!!! Two Colors Game jam version is in the gotcoffee_twocolor.zip !!!

The version of the game that is played in the browser is for the Floppy Jam

If you want to play the updated and playable version please download the .html and .js file or go to the github page!

Use arrows ans Z to play game

This game came to be because we decided to enter Two Color jam, Coffee Jam and Floppy Jam at the same time and this is the end result.
